verses.text: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies ; and, behold, they \add were\add* written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah , \add who\add* were carried away to Babylon for their transgression. \p
¶ Now the first inhabitants that \add dwelt\add* in their possessions in their cities \add were\add*, the Israelites , the priests , Levites , and the Nethinims.
And in Jerusalem dwelt of the children of Judah , and of the children of Benjamin , and of the children of Ephraim , and Manasseh ;
Uthai the son of Ammihud , the son of Omri , the son of Imri , the son of Bani , of the children of Pharez the son of Judah.
And of the Shilonites ; Asaiah the firstborn , and his sons.
And of the sons of Zerah ; Jeuel , and their brethren , six hundred and ninety.
And of the sons of Benjamin ; Sallu the son of Meshullam , the son of Hodaviah , the son of Hasenuah ,
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham , and Elah the son of Uzzi , the son of Michri , and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah , the son of Reuel , the son of Ibnijah ;
And their brethren , according to their generations , nine hundred and fifty and six. All these men \add were\add* chief of the fathers in the house of their fathers. \p
¶ And of the priests ; Jedaiah , and Jehoiarib , and Jachin ,
And Azariah the son of Hilkiah , the son of Meshullam , the son of Zadok , the son of Meraioth , the son of Ahitub , the ruler of the house of God ;\f + \fr 9.11 \ft Azariah: also called, Seraiah\f*
And Adaiah the son of Jeroham , the son of Pashur , the son of Malchijah , and Maasiai the son of Adiel , the son of Jahzerah , the son of Meshullam , the son of Meshillemith , the son of Immer ;

And their brethren , heads of the house of their fathers , a thousand and seven hundred and threescore ; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft very…: Heb. mighty men of valour\f* \p
And of the Levites ; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub , the son of Azrikam , the son of Hashabiah , of the sons of Merari ;
And Bakbakkar , Heresh , and Galal , and Mattaniah the son of Micah , the son of Zichri , the son of Asaph ;
And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah , the son of Galal , the son of Jeduthun , and Berechiah the son of Asa , the son of Elkanah , that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
And the porters \add were\add*, Shallum , and Akkub , and Talmon , and Ahiman , and their brethren : Shallum \add was\add* the chief ;
Who hitherto \add waited\add* in the king’s gate eastward : they \add were\add* porters in the companies of the children of Levi.

And Shallum the son of Kore , the son of Ebiasaph , the son of Korah , and his brethren , of the house of his father , the Korahites , \add were\add* over the work of the service , keepers of the gates of the tabernacle : and their fathers , \add being\add* over the host of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add were\add* keepers of the entry.\f + \fr 9.19 \ft gates: Heb. thresholds\f*
And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the ruler over them in time past , \add and\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* with him.
\add And\add* Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah \add was\add* porter of the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.

All these \add which were\add* chosen to be porters in the gates \add were\add* two hundred and twelve. These were reckoned by their genealogy in their villages , whom David and Samuel the seer did ordain in their set office.\f + \fr 9.22 \ft did…: Heb. founded\f*\f + \fr 9.22 \ft set…: or, trust\f*
So they and their children \add had\add* the oversight of the gates of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add namely\add*, the house of the tabernacle , by wards.
In four quarters were the porters , toward the east , west , north , and south.
And their brethren , \add which were\add* in their villages , \add were\add* to come after seven days from time to time with them.

For these Levites , the four chief porters , were in \add their\add* set office , and were over the chambers and treasuries of the house of God.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft set…: or, trust\f*\f + \fr 9.26 \ft chambers: or, storehouses\f* \p
¶ And they lodged round about the house of God , because the charge \add was\add* upon them, and the opening thereof every morning \add pertained\add* to them.

And \add certain\add* of them had the charge of the ministering vessels , that they should bring them in and out by tale.\f + \fr 9.28 \ft bring…: Heb. bring them in by tale, and carry them out by tale\f*

\add Some\add* of them also \add were\add* appointed to oversee the vessels , and all the instruments of the sanctuary , and the fine flour , and the wine , and the oil , and the frankincense , and the spices.\f + \fr 9.29 \ft instruments: or, vessels\f*
And \add some\add* of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.

And Mattithiah , \add one\add* of the Levites , who \add was\add* the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite , had the set office over the things that were made in the pans.\f + \fr 9.31 \ft set…: or, trust\f*\f + \fr 9.31 \ft in…: or, on flat plates, or, slices\f*

And \add other\add* of their brethren , of the sons of the Kohathites , \add were\add* over the shewbread , to prepare \add it\add* every sabbath.\f + \fr 9.32 \ft shewbread: Heb. bread of ordering\f*

And these \add are\add* the singers , chief of the fathers of the Levites , \add who remaining\add* in the chambers \add were\add* free : for they were employed in \add that\add* work day and night.\f + \fr 9.33 \ft they…: Heb. upon them\f*
These chief fathers of the Levites \add were\add* chief throughout their generations ; these dwelt at Jerusalem. \p
¶ And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon , Jehiel , whose wife’s name \add was\add* Maachah :
And his firstborn son Abdon , then Zur , and Kish , and Baal , and Ner , and Nadab ,
And Gedor , and Ahio , and Zechariah , and Mikloth.
And Mikloth begat Shimeam. And they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem , over against their brethren.
And Ner begat Kish ; and Kish begat Saul ; and Saul begat Jonathan , and Malchi-shua , and Abinadab , and Esh-baal.
And the son of Jonathan \add was\add* Merib-baal : and Merib-baal begat Micah.
And the sons of Micah \add were\add*, Pithon , and Melech , and Tahrea , \add and Ahaz\add*.
And Ahaz begat Jarah ; and Jarah begat Alemeth , and Azmaveth , and Zimri ; and Zimri begat Moza ;
And Moza begat Binea ; and Rephaiah his son , Eleasah his son , Azel his son.
And Azel had six sons , whose names \add are\add* these, Azrikam , Bocheru , and Ishmael , and Sheariah , and Obadiah , and Hanan : these \add were\add* the sons of Azel.
